head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DANIEL, WILLIAM WALLACE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DANIEL, WILLIAM WALLACE

block.p: DANIEL-William Wallace. Born May 19, 1959, died September 5, 2000. With profound heartfelt sadness we mourn Will: Great friend, Wild friend, Sweet friend, El Jefe, Captain, Wolfman, Our Ace. 20 year member of the Cats & Dogs Softball League. Founding member of The Fetchers, Bad DogsMad Dogs. Sunday's and league play will never be as enjoyable without you. You will be sorely missed both on and off the field. Services will be held on Friday, September 8th, 4PM at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 Street. Cats & Dogs friends
